column5: One of the member at my club has invited me for the 'trip of a lifetime' .. wondering if any of you folks have any tidbits to make the experience even more fun.

I have never been there but as a long time guide I can tell you not to forget to tip your guides, kitchen and housekeeping staff. Oh and listen to your guides, they get paid to catch you fish.  Sounds like an awesome trip. Can I come too?

You are extremely lucky, people used to dream about fishing Larry's Gulch when it was a Govt operation and open to the elite and invitees of the government.  I would scout around on New Brunswick bulletin board like this one  http://newbrunswickfishing.com/forums/index.php?/index  Ask some questions.  There was a feature article in the Atlantic Salmon Journal recently, perhaps you might find it on-line.  Tight Line and screaming reels  David  aka  Superdad
